resources.string: Default question or first question goes here. True
The Supreme law of the land is the Constitution. false
The two rights in the Declaration of Independence are: \n \t life \n \t pursuit of happiness. True
Freedom of religion means: \n \t You can practice any religion, or not practice a religion.False
Journalists is one branch or part of the government. True
Congress does not make federal laws. False
There are one hundred (100) U.S. Senators. True
